home.title: Welcome to Easy Learning Language in Kamionki
home.subtitle: A school where you learn English with a native speaker.
home.subsubtitle: Professionally, individually, and with visible results.
home.infoTitle: Learn English with Easy Learning Language
home.infoText: English is widely recognized as an international language used by people around the world. Knowledge of English allows for communication in almost every corner of the globe and is often required in a wide variety of jobs. At Easy Learning Language, each student receives individualized attention, allowing for faster progress. Classes are filled with exercises in reading, listening, and writing, allowing students to quickly master both spoken and written English. During classes, numerous conversations in English are also held, allowing students to familiarize themselves with pronunciation and overcome the speaking barrier. We guarantee attractive course prices.

courses.title: English Language Learning
courses.text: Knowledge of English is very useful for people of all ages. Start learning as soon as possible.

courses.title: English Tutoring
courses.text: At Easy Learning Language, we provide comprehensive tutoring for learners of all proficiency levels.

courses.title: Exam Preparation
courses.text: For many students, language exams can be stressful. We help you prepare for 8th-grade and high school exams.

courses.title: Holiday English Courses
courses.text: During holidays, you can relax and also expand your language skills by joining our English courses.

courses.title: Business English Courses
courses.text: Each industry has its own specific language. Our business English courses focus on vocabulary relevant to your field.

courses.title: Contact
courses.text: All those interested in our offer or who want to get more information about Easy Learning Language are warmly welcome to contact us via phone or email.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: EASY Learning Language â€“ Your Language School in Kamionki
about.mainText: Easy Learning Language is a modern language school run by Beatrice Ajwang, located in Kamionki, near PoznaÅ„. We teach English to children, teenagers, and adults â€“ from beginner A1 to advanced C1 levels.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to create a friendly, inspiring atmosphere where learning becomes a pleasure and results are quickly visible. We focus on individual approach, modern teaching methods, and direct contact with a native speaker, which sets us apart from other schools. Thanks to this, our students develop natural language fluency and confidence in communication.

about.guarantee: Thanks to our passion, experience, and commitment, we guarantee learning at the highest level â€“ tailored to each student's needs.
